title: Phone camera is glitchy, especially in video mode, cam shakes. Def hardware issue (can hear movmnt).
content:
Phone camera is glitchy, especially in video mode, cam shakes. Definately a hardware issue (can hear a piece physically moving when this happens).
Happens in safe mode, and with and without camera app updates. 
Problem is, the only support option i have listed is "callback" and not "chat", and every time i try the call option, i receive an alert "please try again during normal business hours" however i have tried different hours throughout the day!
Need help contacting Google for a replacement.
